HEEEElP :-) i can not get this right when i am burning it. It is one "MDF" file and one "MDS" file. Howe do i burn it for working? I have been using Nero burningrom / Express and i have tryed with Alcohol 120%. I am mostli graitfull for anyone`s HELP !??! +++Sorry, my english is not very good+++. Best reegards, "Kaireser", from Norway.

Hi Kaireser!

For mds mdf files use Alcohol 120% I burned it out also with this prog.Adjust nothing by the prog.first extract the rar files. select the first piece then say eytract... 
1. just use image burning option ,
2.search the file MDS/MDF
open it then burn it on 4x speed!-(DAO-disc at once) dont need to adjust it.
thats all.
ohh and use the latest alcohol 120% 
it must work ,if you do these things ;)
good luck.

HI MISEE!
Thank you for your ekselent help! Now it is working, and i am driving aaaal night long:-)
Thank you so mutch! Kaireser.
